content.text: Over the past two days (July 21-23, 2025), the elizaOS/eliza repository showed significant activity with a total of 11 new PRs (10 merged), 19 new issues, and between 10-11 active contributors daily. The repository maintained consistent contribution levels with slightly higher activity on July 21 compared to July 22.
PR #5650 by @wtfsayo titled 'feat: Add Clanker Plugin with SDK v4.0.0 Integration' is open.
PR #5659 by @standujar titled 'feat: enhance-logging-rebased' is open, which appears to be a rebased version of PR #5203 that enhances logging capabilities in CLI.
PR #5642 by @wtfsayo titled 'docs: add critical ElizaOS component clarifications to CLAUDE.md' is completed.
PR #5623 titled 'refactor(plugin-bootstrap): migrate JSON prompts to XML format' is completed.
PR #5628 titled 'fix: JSON strings in sql base' is completed.
PR #5652 titled 'feat: add post examples to default eliza char' is completed.
PR #5651 titled 'cleanup: remove unused test-function-detection.sh script' is completed.
PR #5641 titled 'fix: CLI dev command test failures due to missing dependencies' is completed.
PR #5663 by @wtfsayo titled 'Validate model parameter for bunExec' is completed.
PR #5660 by @wtfsayo titled 'Prevent undefined model use restoration' is completed.
PR #5662 by @wtfsayo titled 'Correct dataset path for HuggingFace upload' is completed.
PR #5661 by @wtfsayo titled 'Remove double escaping from bunExec prompt' is completed.

Issue #5616 titled 'When running `elizaos create` command, the `.elizadb` directory is being created in the wrong location (current working directory) instead of inside the newly created project folder.' by @linear is CLOSED.
Issue #5657 titled '`elizaos publish` fails with zod module error in newly created plugins' by @linear is OPEN.
Issue #5656 titled 'update action-chaining docs on docs repo/site' by @linear is OPEN.
Issue #5655 titled 'update create-eliza command npm deployment etc' by @linear is OPEN.
Issue #5654 titled 'Add MCP plugin docs' by @linear is OPEN.
Issue #5664 titled 'i use Google API : my Agent not Give a replay' by @1BDO is CLOSED after receiving 9 comments.
Issue #5668 titled 'Produce Video 3: ## Your First Agent - Zero to Running## Multiple Agents & Characters' by @linear is OPEN.
Issue #5667 titled 'Produce Video 2: ## Your First Agent - Zero to Running## Multiple Agents & Characters' by @linear is OPEN.
Issue #5666 titled 'Produce Video #1: ## Getting Started Right - CLI vs Monorepo' by @linear is OPEN.
